description: An object holding supporting pieces of data and/or processing instructions for Instance delete processing

item.description: Instructions for processing Inventory Items during Instance deletion

blockDeletion.description: Prevent deletion of an item, and thus the Instance, if given item property is matched by regex

holdingsRecord.description: Instructions for processing Inventory holdings records during Instance deletion

blockDeletion.description: Prevent deletion of a holdings record, and thus the Instance, if given holdings record property is matched by regex

instance.description: Instructions for processing an Inventory Instance on Instance delete request

blockDeletion.description: Prevent deletion of an Instance, if given Instance property is matched by regex
